ModMetadata.Name: IC10Sync
ModMetadata.Author: Semoro
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]IC10Sync[/h1] This is a Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad [img]https://i.imgur.com/c3qYm69.png[/img]
[b]Mod for Stationeers that allows you to edit your IC10s directly in your favorite text editor.[/b] It will sync your IC10s every 10 seconds.
When new IC10 is crafted, it will automatically appear in "%USERPROFILE%/Documents/My Games/Stationeers/chipdata" folder - you can change the path in the config file. You can edit the IC10s in any text editor, and when you save the file, it will automatically sync to the game.
[b]Note that those files are going to be overwritten every time you load the game.[/b]
[b]Works in multiplayer[/b]
